item.title: How to add llms.txt to a Hugo Blog
item.description: Learn how to add an llms.txt file to your Hugo blog to make it more visible to AI agents and improve Generative Engine Optimization (GEO).

item.title: Crosspost Your Blog articles to Social Media
item.description: Learn how to automatically share your latest blog posts to Mastodon, Twitter/X, and other social networks using GitHub Actions and the crosspost tool. A simple way to regain traffic lost to search engines and AI.

item.title: Optimizing Hugo Sitemaps to prioritize posts crawling over taxonomies
item.description: Learn how to optimize your Hugo site’s sitemap by adjusting priority and change frequency settings to improve SEO and guide search engine crawlers effectively.

item.title: Automatically setting 'lastmod' in Hugo pages with Git modification date
item.description: Learn how to automatically set the ’lastmod’ parameter in Hugo pages using Git modification dates to improve SEO and expedite search engine indexing.

item.title: SEO kicks my stats
item.description: Explore the impact of domain changes on SEO performance and traffic, and learn strategies to improve international visibility with multilingual content.

item.title: WordPress - add meta tags: author, description, keywords, etc
item.description:
After reading some SEO stuff I wanted to add some meta tags to my WordPress blog. I found this site: codex.wordpress.org/Meta_Tags_in_WordPress  .

So WordPress thinks that it’s not necessary to have this meta tags any more… But I want it! 😃 Next funny thing is how they suggest to add meta tags: copy header.php - what about theme updates?
